scripts.start:mongo: npm run prestart:mongo && npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n server,web,mobile,open-expo -c green,cyan,magenta,gray "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev:open --prefix frontend" "npm run start:open --prefix mobile" "node scripts/open-expo-devtools.js"
scripts.start:memdb: cross-env USE_INMEMORY_MONGO=1 concurrently -n server,web,mobile,open-expo -c green,cyan,magenta,gray "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev:open --prefix frontend" "npm run start:open --prefix mobile" "node scripts/open-expo-devtools.js"
scripts.start:server:memdb: cross-env USE_INMEMORY_MONGO=1 npm run dev --prefix server
